attributes.additional_details: BBC STORY  http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-35378985 AND  http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3410914/David-Cameron-declares-war-witch-hunt-lawyers-PM-backs-Mail-campaign-crack-hounding-brave-British-soldiers.html-Cameron responsible for this scandulous attack on lawyers doing their job in bringing cases on behalf of claimants
attributes.background: CAMERON HAS ATTACKED LAWYERS FOR BRINGING 'SPURIOUS CLAIMS'-THIS IS AN ATTACK ON THE RULE OF LAW -ONLY COURTS SHOULD DECIDE IF CLAIMS ARE SPURIOUS-THERE IS COMPELLING   EVIDENCE THAT IRAQI CIVILIANS WERE ABUSED BY SOLDIERS IN IRAQ -OVER 350 HAVE BEEN COMPENSATED ALREADY BY THE MOD

rejection.details: If you would like to ask the Prime Minister to apologise for these remarks, we could accept a petition asking for that.
